plugin.name: ✍️ Meeting Notes
plugin.description: Create Meeting Notes from events using templates.
plugin.author: NotePlan

plugin.commands.name: newMeetingNote
plugin.commands.description: Create a meeting note by choosing an event and a template.

plugin.commands.name: newMeetingNoteFromEventID
plugin.commands.description: Create a meeting note for a passed EventID.

plugin.commands.name: insertNoteTemplate
plugin.commands.description: Inserts a template into the current note

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description: Set how much output will be displayed for this plugin the NotePlan > Help > Plugin Console. DEBUG is the most verbose; NONE is the least (silent)
